channel.title: Cache Changing
channel.description:
Need help changin cache..
I put in a new background then from the C: I made the regular cache into a zip put it into dropbox\public (which hosts stuff) then I changed the cache downloaded and the one in the client.java
Heres what I get upon doing that
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/rjkwg3.jpg[/img]
I dont understand its the same cache I just edited the background uploaded it again and change the cachedownload/client so it downloads my cache so other people with have that background :S
If you kno what wrong can you leave a comment you dont have to spoonfeed but a lil help would be nice :S Also offering RS2 Account for fix Highscore: Rayovac 2 99s 1 is mage 1 is cooking

item.title: Cache Changing
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

[quote=“i fail serv, post:3, topic:399623”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=496755.msg3632209#msg3632209 date=1308328253]
yay i got it to work

when u change the background make sure to save it as “name”.PNG
[/quote]
lawl… mine it’s using JPEG and works 100% :F[/quote]
Lmao? In order for a background to work in the cache you need to save it as a .PNG not .JPEG.

Read full topic
